actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution making certain minority party appointments to certain standing committees of the Senate for the 97th Congress.

summary.text: Assigns for the remainder of the 97th Congress: (1) Senator Matsunaga of Hawaii to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources; (2) Senator Sasser of Tennessee, to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs; and (3) Senator Inouye of Hawaii, to the Committee on Rules and Administration. Revises minority party membership ranking for the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution making certain minority party appointments to certain standing committees of the Senate for the 97th Congress.
